veneers.title: Dental Veneers
veneers.description: Transform your smile with custom-made thin shells that cover the front surface of teeth.

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.description: Replace missing teeth with permanent, natural-looking implants that function like real teeth.

crowns.title: Dental Crowns
crowns.description: Restore damaged teeth with custom-fitted dental crowns that improve function and appearance.

hollywood.title: Hollywood Smile
hollywood.description: Get that perfect celebrity smile with a complete makeover using veneers and whitening.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Straighten your teeth with modern orthodontic solutions, including invisible aligners.

pricing.pricing_description: Get accurate cost estimates for your dental treatments in Istanbul. Select the treatments you're interested in, and we'll calculate the total price in both GBP and USD.
pricing.select_treatments_description: Choose from our list of available treatments and specify the quantity needed
pricing.name: Your Name
pricing.quote_summary_description: Personalized cost estimate based on your selections
pricing.select_treatments_to_generate: Please select treatments and click 'Calculate My Quote'
pricing.quote_validity_note: This quote is valid for 30 days. Prices are approximate and subject to confirmation by the clinic.
pricing.step_select_treatments: Select your desired treatments from the dropdown
pricing.step_enter_details: Enter your name, email and phone number
pricing.all_treatments_include: All treatments include consultation, examination, and post-treatment care.
pricing.why_choose_istanbul: Why our patients choose Istanbul for dental treatment
pricing.benefit_savings: Average savings compared to UK prices
pricing.pricing_faq_1_question: Why are dental treatments so much cheaper in Istanbul?
pricing.pricing_faq_1_answer: Dental treatments in Istanbul cost significantly less due to lower operational costs, favorable exchange rates, and government incentives for healthcare tourism, while maintaining world-class quality and using the same premium materials and technology as Western clinics.
pricing.pricing_faq_2_question: Are there any hidden costs I should be aware of?
pricing.pricing_faq_2_answer: No, the prices shown include the complete treatment cost. However, additional procedures may be recommended by the dentist after your initial examination if medically necessary. These would be discussed with you before proceeding.
pricing.pricing_faq_3_question: Do these prices include guarantees or warranty?
pricing.pricing_faq_3_answer: Yes, all treatments come with guarantees as indicated in the quote. These guarantees are honored internationally, and we work only with clinics that stand behind their work.
pricing.pricing_faq_4_question: How do I pay for my treatment?
pricing.pricing_faq_4_answer: You can pay directly at the clinic using credit card or cash. Most clinics also accept bank transfers. No upfront payment is required to secure your appointment through Istanbul Dental Smile.
